title: Creative Arts by Charles Leonard Glitter, 16 Ounce Bottle, Silver (41145)
description: With over 70 years of experience in the School and Office Supply markets, Charles Leonard Inc. is not just one of those online “Pop-Up” shops that are here today and gone tomorrow! With Charles Leonard products, rest assured that our products provide the quality and value you expect. These 1 pound bottles assure you have enough glitter to brighten up any arts and craft project. Bright and vibrant shimmering glitter flakes come in an easy to use bottle that has a convenient shaker top that helps regulate how much glitter comes out. Just spread adhesive on any surface and let the glitter decorate!
